Reviews.Title: “Another great stay!”
Reviews.Author: missouritraveler8
Reviews.Content: returned trip branson stay stay usual leaving 1 night storm knocked power idea fixed dark hot wouldnt able sleep especially child packed dark left understand wasnt fault couldnt provide flashlights candles able bathroom 5 star rating mention manager couldnt sorry goodbye choice leave offered money nights stay

Reviews.Title: “Very accomodating”
Reviews.Author: lauriemc64
Reviews.Content: husband decided stay inn anniversary weekend planning paid 3 nights king bed 300 night discount regular 4999 night staying night trouble climbing stairs wont try hurt couple days decided home day checked 11 refunded nights stay nice

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, fun staff, very clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Mel R
Reviews.Content: stay motor inn twice issue motel prices reasonable staff smiling willing help kristi housekeeper time weve stayed clean girl front desk courteous willing help town level parking helps wife hilton price recommend staying

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time at the Baldknobbers Inn and Theater.”
Reviews.Author: mrfast120
Reviews.Content: clean neat staff friendly didnt cant hardly beat location motel strip walking distance nice restaurants

Reviews.Title: “clean convienient and nice staff”
Reviews.Author: scarney0180
Reviews.Content: stayed 100 special tickets night king funny clean wrong housekeepers friendly quick front desk helpful comfortable reviews stay

Reviews.Title: “great time”
Reviews.Author: sprite4OzarkAr
Reviews.Content: spent night friend granddaughter atayed times pleased stay convience location ie haveing fight traffic stay nice

Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable, good value”
Reviews.Author: aloha-from-MO
Reviews.Content: stayed night value clean comfortable bed firm comfortable hairdryer ironing board provided rent refrigerator 5 day sink shower liquid soap dispensers installed alternative tiny soap bars provided slippery time upstairs firstfloor ice dispenser little noise hours otherwise quiet dont recommend restaurant breakfast buffet cheap food mediocre drinks 250

HotelInfo.Name: Baldknobbers Motor Inn
